220ea73a-2297-4187-9a8c-1a75115d656b: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} has not attacked this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{uip|BonusArmour|8f5993cab35844cd8e0efbadc1c5dcbe}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. 23f56ab5-f4b5-4419-9b65-f5c017efc773: Enemies suffer a −10% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks (including {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}) against the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} for every enemy in a 1-cell radius around the Warrior. Stacks up to 3 times.
25515f77-b2c8-438c-8107-9f818a1e5fc1:
For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} stays on their feet, even if their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} reach zero. The Warrior also strikes back when receiving attacks and guards allies in a 3-cell radius around them, jumping in and striking enemies with preemptively, making enemy attacks 50% easier to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
! Requires a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon.
25b0b6a0-6a8f-48f5-8f3f-26aa5b7decef: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Warrior gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
28295303-260b-4d9e-a642-6496afdbf1e5: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains the Slash {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} with {uip|Slices|54f73c2523524544a8d7ffc3807056f0} charges for this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Slash cannot be used in the same round as Charge.{br} Slash (0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}): The Warrior dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. -Can be applied only once for one target per round. -Does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}.
28f1396d-3333-41e5-88c4-6fef905b5513: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
2d677cf7-aad0-40bd-af37-00151461630e: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

3813eda9-6e52-4722-93b8-8b270a16b044: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies that have no allies in adjacent cells.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} dashes through an enemy to the cell on the enemy's opposite side and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} with −50% reduced {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

44cf8506-330d-4ddc-8531-bdfb9b5da7c4: Number of times you can use Slash
55f03ded-b090-4fc8-86a2-28a398ca7b4b: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +(2 × Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and until the end of combat, the Warrior can't use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

64b3244e-b12d-41e7-88c7-0aa2a47d18bd:
{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Attacks of opportunity{/g} deal −{uip|DamageBonus|f4ce17dcf66f4231bb58a580da943b53}% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}.
Movement within {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of attacks of opportunity costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} less.
661c51aa-770c-43fc-8859-19b196a57a16: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against the first attack made by every enemy this combat.
6bd60a02-bf88-4e61-a590-4a918e98fb7d: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} screams at their enemies to draw their attention and becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} of any enemy who fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
6e10c07f-2ae2-4189-ae59-086196a18490: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} MP until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. They don't lose MP after performing attacks. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.

87cdc39f-a6d0-4c6d-8538-7a88af98703e: If there are no enemies adjacent to the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|DamageBonus|ea7d851dd97441e2867fe29f23364f3c} for one {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}.
88dd56a4-5b39-4ce2-9691-8b982110da5f: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} moves in a straight line and launches a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against any target in the Warrior's path. This attack does not count toward the limit of the Warrior's {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}. There must be at least 2 free cells between the Warrior and the target to use Charge.
89bf07b4-a992-4e84-a889-51deca67cd4f: Reduces the required {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} value for heavy weapons by −25.
979e22e0-890c-4554-82e0-187f973df8fe:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warriors{/g} are combatants boasting exceptional {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} prowess, capable of dealing high {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.
97bb6143-5a76-4af0-a762-22ad5da0eff7: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} pushes an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
996a5365-86f4-47f3-819f-9d8befd7fa69: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} near an enemy affected by the Sworn Enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the Warrior gains +{uip|TemporaryWounds|8b1920f555924a0dbe5caa88129061f0} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
a1e95ec4-1cd4-4d44-86a2-28a5e115197e: Daring Breach also grants +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} this turn.
a3f964d8-bd57-4774-a952-3c01d10e5d5d: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g} away by Forceful Strike suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from collisions with objects and other enemies.

aac30508-38a3-4a70-aa53-c42e158f9fd4: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} while under the Endure effect, their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 until the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
af26970c-f579-46fa-8afb-38ff77f0ae83: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain +{uip|BonusDamage|1c61468f25fc410586a383c32050e971}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.

Does not stack.
b5e7a191-3522-4560-9f64-3b02a17ba602: Allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} to use medikits without the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill. Also, the Warrior gains additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} whenever a medikit is used on them.
c8495e45-1996-42fe-a900-5c773dd283ce: You have already used Slash against this enemy this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
cafcfa5c-7d47-4022-b3d4-7de9c6802809: Allows the character to use Drukhari weapons.
cc71688d-5dcd-48b9-ad0c-747ef7026a0b: For one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for every enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Also, the Warrior gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of combat.
cef41f94-8d87-491a-a939-130bf155dacb: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gathers all their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}strength{/g} for a crushing strike. Their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} pushes the enemy away. The distance of that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} is equal to {uip|Push|93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6} cells.
db879785-2678-4b1e-9892-b320a7997e88: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +{uip|BonusPenetetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +{uip|BonusDamage|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and ignores {uip|ParryPenetration|ad2a77c5012c4ffd9a19204dcf794266}% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Every enemy who survives an attack enhanced by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} will attack the Warrior in return, including creatures with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons.
ea63b92d-10ee-4035-b2fa-e8d7682703a6: Allows the character to use plasma weapons, such as plasma gun, plasma pistol, and others.
f66bfe5b-8b85-43ed-8a28-5aade2488ddf: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, their next Warrior {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.
fd06b0d7-60b5-40d3-a253-a33c1bcd057f: The area of Taunting Scream extends +2 cells wider around the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} and +2 cells farther forward.
